name: MindTherapist
0:
”Alexa, open Mind Therapist”
”I am having a burnout at work and want strategies to better manage stress and improve work-life balance.”
”How can I provide effective emotional support for a loved one who is experiencing depression.”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mind therapist
des: Ask your modern life problems and get lighthearted answers based on the learnings from ancient scriptures. It uses the Azure Open AI and Chat GPT 3.5 model to understand your questions and then responds.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
